mapper.select: select rtnum,hinum,startrent,endrent,status,person,pay_price ,(select title from house_info where hinum = a.hinum) title ,(select case when count(*) = 0 then 'n' else 'y' end as rag_yn from review where rtnum = a.rtnum) rag_yn from rent a where menum = #{menum}
mapper.update: update grade set del_yn = 'y' where renum in(select renum from review where rtnum = #{rtnum} and menum = #{menum} and del_yn = 'n')
update rent set del_yn = 'y' , status = 2 where rtnum = #{rtnum} and del_yn = 'n'
